decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Existing Plan, Proposed Plan 1 Removals, Proposed Plan 2 Additions, First and Second Floor Plans - Lease Plan 2; received 17 March 2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted within use class D1 shall be restricted to the hours of 9am-9:30pm Monday-Friday and 8.30-6pm on Saturdays and 10-4pm on Sundays and Bank Holidays.

Condition : 4 - No amplified music or speech played in the premises shall be audible when measured at the nearest noise sensitive premises (No. 374 Chiswick High Road) and windows that face Belmont Road shall not be opened when amplified music or speech is played in the premises.
description: Change of use from B1 to D1
